intro: Cut. Sell. Upgrade. Become Alaska’s ultimate lumberjack.
description:
Step into the frozen wilderness of Alaska in this first-person lumberjack experience built for players who love progress, discovery, and the satisfaction of powerful upgrades.

Explore dense forests, chop down trees with your growing arsenal of axes, and sell the timber to expand your skills. Start with a simple tool and steadily upgrade your equipment to tackle thicker trunks, harvest wood faster, and earn bigger payouts. Every improvement feels meaningful - every swing becomes stronger.

Whether you’re clearing paths through untouched woodland or mastering the rhythm of efficient cutting, your journey is all about becoming the best lumberjack you can be. No pressure, no timers - just pure, immersive resource-gathering gameplay in the heart of Alaska’s wild nature.

Build your craft. Shape the land. Rise as the true Lumberjack of Alaska.
